entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 a.m. EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
